main_definition: A hard, durable piece of metal with a flat head used in fastening materials together by being hammered into them.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To complete or accomplish something successfully or precisely, often implying effort and skill
meanings_and_examples.example: She nailed the job interview with her confident demeanor.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A measure of success in doing a task or achieving an objective
meanings_and_examples.example: Completing a project on time was crucial; it was a real nail-biter situation for our team.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To hit or strike something with force, often implying accuracy and intent
meanings_and_examples.example: He nailed the basketball through the hoop in one swift motion.
